source.description: Add 2x106 cells in 2 mL of HBSS/HEPES for each tube.

Incubate for
with 2 Micromolar (µM) of C-DCFH-DA in the dark at
(Dubnoff Bath).

Wash twice with
of HBSS/HEPES.
Each time centrifuge at

source.description:
Recover PMN in cuvette of 2 ml in the dark at
(Dubnoff Bath).
Measurements of fluorescence must be performed by means of a Spectrofluorimeter with excitation wavelength of 488 nm.

Cuvette must be maintained at
by means of a thermostatic bath, that will be turned on before the starting ROS measurement.

Fluorescence emission must be collected at 525 nm and recorded in a specific data table that will be signed for each specific experimental plan (time for recording and complete time analysis), that will be signed by the researcher.
Intracellular ROS levels must be expressed as fluorescence intensity, in arbitrary units (AU) or according to the specific experimental plan.
Isolate PMN using either protocol PMN- 01a or PMN 01b.

description:
